body.name: Charmin Ultra Soft Toilet Paper, 9 Mega Rolls Bath Tissue = 36 Regular Rolls
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 6 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Pack contains 9 Rolls (264 sheets per roll) of Charmin Ultra Soft toilet paper
1 Charmin Mega Roll = 4 Regular rolls based on number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll bath tissue
Charmin softest 2-ply toilet paper ever made
More absorbent so you can use less vs. The leading bargain brand
body.description: Charmin Ultra Soft is our softest toilet paper ever so it is harder than ever to resist! It is 2x more absorbent versus the leading bargain brand. When you buy Charmin Ultra Soft Mega Roll toilet paper you get a big, long-lasting roll because one Charmin Mega Roll equals 4 Regular Rolls. Also, Charmin Ultra Soft bath tissue is 2-ply and septic-safe. We all go to the bathroom, those who go with Charmin Ultra Soft toilet paper really Enjoy the Go! (Based on number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll bath tissue)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get irresistible cush for your tush with Charmin Ultra Soft Smooth Tear Every roll is crafted with wavy perforations that tear better, for a smooth, more enjoyable go. And each sheet of toilet paper is 2X more absorbent so you can use less (vs. the leading USA 1-ply bargain brand). We made it MEGA in size, so you get mega value. That’s right, our Charmin Ultra Soft Mega Roll equals 4 regular rolls (based on number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll bath tissue), so you’ll be running back to the store less and less. Our Charmin Ultra Soft toilet paper is also 2-ply and designed to be clog-safe and septic-safe. We all go, why not Enjoy The Go with America’s favorite toilet paper*. *Charmin Brand based on sales. Source: Nielsen 2022 dollar sales.

Enjoy The Go with Charmin Ultra Soft Mega Roll Absorb More, Use Less! Each sheet of toilet paper is 2X more absorbent so you can use less (vs. the leading USA 1-ply bargain brand) and go longer without changing the roll. Irresistible Softness Charmin Ultra Soft is irresistibly soft and designed to feel comfortable in use. Charmin Ultra Soft will deliver the softness you love. Enjoy the go with America’s favorite toilet paper!​ ​*Charmin Brand based on sales. Source: Nielsen 2022 dollar sales. Mega Roll = Mega Value! Charmin Ultra Soft Mega Roll has 4x the number or sheets as Charmin Regular roll and was created to last for you and your family. Charmin Ultra Soft is guaranteed to fit*. Enjoy the go with Charmin Ultra Soft Mega Roll!​​ *visit Charmin.com for details

Charmin Beyond The Roll Made with American Jobs Charmin is proudly manufactured in the USA. 100% of Charmin products are made with American jobs that support thousands of employees and their families. FSC Certified The forest is our home. So we’re committed to keeping it around by partnering with leading conservation organizations. Charmin Recycles 100% of Charmin finished product cores are made of FSCTM certified recycled material and can be recycled after use.

Reforestation For every tree used, we regrow two more. And we’re committed to zero deforestation practices for the health of our forests. Forest Restoration We partner with organizations like the Arbor Day Foundation to fund forest replenishment in areas devastated by natural disasters like wildfires. Protect, Grow and Restore. Charmin aims to keep forests as forests. 100% of our pulp comes from responsibly managed forests and other controlled wood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazingly soft I am so pleased and thankful
reviews.reviewText: Literally the softest toilet paper I’ve ever used, this is the only toilet paper I’ve used since I was about seven years old and I am now 23. I remember being young and fighting for my family to purchase this toilet paper because my friend had it and it was the softest toilet paper I had ever felt. My family used quilted Northern and it was painful for me. I fought to get this toilet paper and I’m so thankful I made the switch as a child and changed my family too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toilet paper ever!
reviews.reviewText: This is the very best toilet paper there is. So soft and strong as well. I will buy this only from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most product for price
reviews.reviewText: Make sure you look at how many sheets/feet per price. This is a good buy at the current price in July 2022

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the trick’
reviews.reviewText: Got it here, when supplies were ridiculously low or sky high 👍🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite tp ever. It's super soft, absorbent, but a little pricey but worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My McCafe Order
reviews.reviewText: On 8/12/23 was delivered on time, there again I only received one package. The same thing happened with my previous order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like an teddy bear softly giving you a hug
reviews.reviewText: Very very soft, but also surprisingly durable. I am rather hirsute and I don’t have any “dingleberries” left after doing the job. Tissue is very thick, which I like, it requires less squares.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels good on my butt
reviews.reviewText: wise man once say "you will never regret paying a premium on underwear, work boots and toilet paper." you may pay less for other brands but you can ruin your day scratching up the ol' poop shoot with infirior products.
